title: ClinGen Follow-up Survey for Volunteer Curators - 3 months

elements.name: intro_html
elements.html:
Thank you for volunteering to participate in ClinGen community curation. In order to better understand the needs and experiences of our volunteers, we would greatly appreciate your feedback on this survey. Your answers will be viewable only to yourself and ClinGen Community Curation Working Group administration staff. It should take ~10-15 minutes.

Thank you!
volunteer@clinicalgenome.org

elements.name: curation_effort
elements.title: What curation effort(s) are you currently volunteering for? (Optional)

elements.name: curation_groups
elements.title: Which ClinGen Curation Group (EP) or Working Group (WG) have you been assigned? (Optional)

elements.name: highest_ed
elements.title: What is your highest level of education?

elements.name: highest_ed_other
elements.title: Please specify:

elements.name: satisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied were you with the communication provided by the Community Curation team?

elements.name: dissatified_feedback
elements.title: If dissatisfied with communication, please provide feedback:

elements.name: training_clear
elements.title: Were the training materials required for your specific curation effort understandable and clear?

elements.name: training_clear_details
elements.title: Please explain:

elements.name: training_sufficient
elements.title: Were the training materials and training sessions provided by the ClinGen Community Curation effort sufficient to assist with your curations?

elements.name: training_sufficient_details
elements.title: Please explain:

elements.name: seek_adtl_trng
elements.title: Did you seek additional information and/or training through your EP or WG, or on your own?

elements.name: seek_adtl_trng_details
elements.title: Please explain and note whether it was specific to the ClinGen curation framework, the disease area, or something else.

elements.name: rcmd_atdl_trng
elements.title: Would you recommend any additional training to volunteers prior to assigning them to EPs or WGs?

elements.name: rcmd_adtl_trng_detail
elements.title: Please explain:

elements.name: assigned_curation
elements.title: Have you been assigned to or performed a curation?

elements.name: hours_spent
elements.title: The estimated time commitment was 8-10 hours per month, do you spend:

elements.name: feedback_helpful
elements.title: If you have received feedback from members of your EP or WG, was it helpful? Please provide details.

elements.name: plan_to_continue
elements.title: Do you plan to continue to be an active member of your EP or WG?

elements.name: plan_to_continue_details
elements.title: Please provide details (e.g. unable to commit time, dissatisfied with EP/WG).

elements.name: transfer
elements.title: Are you interested in transferring to a different curation activity (e.g. variant, actionability)?

choices.text: No, I would like to stay in my curation group.
Yes, I would like to transfer to a different curation group.

elements.name: join_adtl
elements.title: Are you interested in joining an additional curation group/activity?

elements.name: recommend
elements.title: Would you recommend volunteering for ClinGen Community Curation efforts (e.g. friends, colleagues, etc)?

elements.name: other_feedback
elements.title: Please provide us with any other comments or feedback (if you would like to make any changes to your status and participation within a curation group please contact volunteer@clinicalgenome.org).
